details.title: Frontend Developer
details.description: Developed and implemented responsive web interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and ReactJS. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to create user-friendly web applications.

details.title: UI/UX Designer
details.description: Designed seamless user experiences and modern interfaces using Figma, Adobe XD, and design principles. Worked on wireframes, prototypes, and user-centered designs.

details.title: Graphics Designer
details.description: Created digital and print designs, branding materials, and marketing assets. Expert in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign.
Focused on full-stack development, software engineering principles, and UI/UX design.
Completed courses in UX Design from platforms like Udemy and Coursera. Specialized in user research, design systems, and prototyping.
Specialized in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive web design.

details.name: HTML & CSS
details.description: Proficient in creating responsive and modern websites using HTML5 and CSS3.

details.name: JavaScript
details.description: Strong experience in JavaScript, ES6, and DOM manipulation.

details.name: Tailwind CSS
details.description: Expertise in using Tailwind CSS for modern and fast UI development.

details.name: Bootstrap
details.description: Experienced in building responsive and mobile-first web pages with Bootstrap.

details.name: ReactJS
details.description: Skilled in building dynamic web applications with React, hooks, and state management.

details.name: Node.js
details.description: Capable of building RESTful APIs and server-side applications using Node.js.

details.name: Java
details.description: Experienced in object-oriented programming with Java for backend systems.
